game.name: Rune Defender
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rune Defender is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rune Defender is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.
